text: Shotgun is a 1955 American western movie directed by Lesley Selander and starring Sterling Hayden, Yvonne De Carlo, Zachary Scott, Guy Prescott, Robert J. Wilke, Angela Greene, Paul Marion. It was distributed by Allied Artists Pictures. == Other websites == * Category:1955 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Lesley Selander
title: Shotgun (1955 movie)
